T02D3664:267b-1: kha dir ba na t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3664:267b-3: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3664:267b-4: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3664:267b-5: dang por re zhig sngags pas sa gzhi legs shing
T02D3664:267b-6: mnyam la gtsang zhing yid dga' ba'i me tog sna
T02D3664:267b-8: bden pa'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3664:267b-9: rang gi snying gar zla ba la t'am yig d'ur
T02D3664:267b-10: ba'i mdog lta bur 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro
T02D3664:267b-11: bar bsam mo // de las 'od zer rnam pa
T02D3664:267b-12: lnga 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig sgrib
T02D3664:267b-13: sbyangs te slar de nyid la bsdu'o //
T02D3664:267b-14: de nas yang rang gi snying ga'i t'am las 'od spros pas /
T02D3664:267b-15: 'og min gyi gnas nas jo mo sgrol ma mdun
T02D3664:267b-16: gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la gsal bar bltas
T02D3664:267b-17: te / bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya'o ;
T02D3664:267b-18: / de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D3664:267b-19: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3664:267b-20: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3664:267b-21: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3664:267b-22: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3664:267b-24: bdag nyid kyi lus dbul ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D3664:267b-28: btang snyoms rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3664:267b-29: de nas rang bzhin gyi sa dag pa'i tshigs su bcad 'di lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
T02D3664:267b-30: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D3664:267b-31: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'an badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3664:268a-0: zhes brjod pas bdag dang gzhan @268a * //
T02D3664:268a-1: gyi dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3664:268a-2: de nas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas
T02D3664:268a-3: nam mkha'i khams su pam yongs su gyur pa la
T02D3664:268a-4: sna tshogs padma'i lta bar aom las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3664:268a-5: 'khor gyi steng du d'ur ba'i mdog lta bu'i t'am
T02D3664:268a-6: yig 'od zer sna tshogs pa can bsgoms la /
T02D3664:268a-7: de la 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
T02D3664:268a-8: rnams bkug nas de nyed la zhugs par bsgom ste
T02D3664:268a-9: / de rnams yongs su gyur pa las lha mo sgrol mar bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3664:268a-10: sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D3664:268a-11: yid dga' ba'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3664:268a-12: phyag g-yon pas autpa la bsnams pa /
T02D3664:268a-13: g-yas pas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i mchog sbyin pa /
T02D3664:268a-14: sna tshogs padma'i steng gi zla ba la zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3664:268a-15: de'i g-yas phyogs su mya ngan med pa'i 'od zer
T02D3664:268a-16: can sku mdog ser mo rin po che sna tshogs
T02D3664:268a-18: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3664:268a-19: phyag g-yas rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D3664:268a-20: g-yon pas mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3664:268a-21: g-yon phyogs su ral gcig ma mi'u thung gi gzugs can sku mdog nag mo /
T02D3664:268a-22: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa /
T02D3664:268a-23: spyan gsum pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal sgra ser po 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3664:268a-24: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang gri gug bsnams pa nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3664:268a-25: yang g-yas phyogs su rma bya chen mo /
T02D3664:268a-26: sku mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3664:268a-27: phyag g-yas pas rnga yab bsnams pa /
T02D3664:268a-28: g-yon pas rma bya'i mdongs bsnams pa /
T02D3664:268a-30: yang g-yon phyogs su dug sel ma sku mdog ljang gu /
T02D3664:268a-31: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin mdzad pa /
T02D3664:268a-33: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3664:268a-34: gzhan yang lha dang lha ma yin gyis bskor bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3664:268a-35: don yod grub pas dbu la rgyas gdab bo //
T02D3664:268a-36: de nas rang gi snying ga las sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi sprin spro bar bsam mo //
T02D3664:268a-37: de ltar bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa skyon /
T02D3664:268a-38: rang gi snying gar autpa la'i steng du zla ba'i
T02D3664:268a-39: dkyil 'khor la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba ltar
T02D3664:268a-41: aom t'a re tutt'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D3664:268b-1: / de nas ldang bar 'dod na sngon bzhin du mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02D3664:268b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la /
T02D3664:268b-3: aom aa mi t'a bha zhes brjod pas sems can
T02D3664:268b-4: thams cad kyi don dang dngos grub thab par bsams
T02D3664:268b-5: la / mu:zhes brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
T02D3664:268b-6: gshegs par bsam zhing slar yang sems can gyi don
T02D3664:268b-7: du byon par gsol ba btab la de nas jo
T02D3664:268b-8: mo sgrol ma'i gzugs kyis ci bde bar spyod lam
T02D3664:268b-9: la / bya'o // mchod pa'i snang ni //
T02D3664:268b-10: aom a'a:h'um t'am t'a re ye /
T02D3664:268b-11: aom a'a:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3664:268b-12: de bzhin du bdug spos dang /
T02D3664:268b-17: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3664:268b-18: slob dpon 'phags la klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3664:268b-20: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal rnam par snang
